explanation: [0-0] In a cozy room, a young man wearing a red floral shirt is sitting in front of a sofa, smiling at a coin with a dollar sign on it that he is holding in his right hand. In front of him is a cardboard game or device with a steering wheel, a coin slot, an "ON" button, an "OFF" button, and symbols like cars, snowmen, etc.

[0-2] He then puts the coin into the coin slot and presses the "ON" button on the game console with his finger. After starting the game, he holds the steering wheel with both hands and starts to turn it. The car starts to move forward as the steering wheel turns.
